name: Catacombs (Horror Concept)
description:
This game is a short atmospheric horror game prototype., that I created to test out making a first-person character along with dark lighting, atmosphere, and voice acting. The inspiration behind this prototype is the Paris Catacombs, as well as underground maintenance tunnels and mines.

The game plays with Mouse and Keyboard. WASD & Mouse control.

The game also features French voice acting with English subtitles and text.

Game Controls:

WASD = Walk

Mouse =  Look

F = Toggle flashlight

Esc = Close game
